participant_1.background:
I do care about my appearance, but it's not my main focus.
i love to walk my dog everyday after work.
I bought my first car for $500, and it was a junker.
I used to be a singer in a church choir, but I had to quit because of my asthma.
i love to listen to frank sinatra.

participant_2.background:
I dress professionally for work and wear comfortable clothes on vacation.
i need to use an inhaler sometimes.
I take my dog for a walk in the park before I head to work at the museum.
i have a lot of allergies.
i work as a veterinarians assistant.

content.text: Hi Mike, I'm Lisa. How are you today?
Pretty good, thanks! I'm just getting ready to head to work. What about you?
I'm doing well, thanks! I'm just getting ready to take my dog for a walk before heading to work.
Oh, that sounds nice! I love taking my dog for walks. What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever named Buddy. He's a great dog!
Aww, golden retrievers are so cute! I've always wanted one.
They're great dogs! They're friendly, loving, and always happy to see you.
That sounds like the perfect dog for me! I'm going to have to start looking into getting one.
That's a great idea! I'm sure you'll love having a golden retriever.
Thanks, Lisa! I hope you have a great day at work!
